author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ethiopia declares state of emergency to curb spread of COVID-19
description: Ethiopia's prime minister, Abiy Ahmed, on Wednesday declared a state of emergency in the country to help curb the spread of the new coronavirus, his office said on Twitter.
content:
ADDIS ABABA (Reuters) - Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed on Wednesday declared a state of emergency in the country to help curb the spread of the new coronavirus, his office said on Twitter. 
“Considering the gravity of the #COVID19, the government of Eth… [+607 chars]
